Workflow.Name: Employee Onboarding Process
Workflow.Definition:
"@@ConnectionString: ''
@@Type: 'Local'
@@DesktopType: 'local'
@@DisplayName: 'Local computer'
IMPORT 'controlRepo.appmask' AS appmask
IMPORT 'imageRepo.imgrepo' AS imgrepo
@SENSITIVE: []
Excel.LaunchExcel.LaunchAndOpenUnderExistingProcess Path: $'''C:\\Users\\shahz\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\Employee onboarding Process.xlsx''' Visible: True ReadOnly: False Instance=> ExcelInstance
Outlook.Launch Instance=> OutlookInstance
Excel.ReadFromExcel.ReadAllCells Instance: ExcelInstance ReadAsText: False FirstLineIsHeader: False RangeValue=> ExcelData
SET NewVar TO 1
LOOP FOREACH CurrentItem IN ExcelData
 IF NewVar <> 1 THEN
 CALL Browser_Automation
 Excel.WriteToExcel.WriteCell Instance: ExcelInstance Value: OutputData[0][0] Column: 13 Row: NewVar
 Excel.WriteToExcel.WriteCell Instance: ExcelInstance Value: OutputData[1][0] Column: 14 Row: NewVar
 Outlook.SendEmailThroughOutlook.SendEmail Instance: OutlookInstance Account: $'''s.khan_19706@khi.iba.edu.pk''' SendTo: CurrentItem[7] Subject: $'''Employee ID and Corporate Email ID''' Body: $'''Hello %CurrentItem[0]%,
Please find the below details for your reference.
Your Employee ID: %OutputData[0]%
Your Corporate Email ID: %OutputData[1]%
Thank you.
Regards
HR Team, Happy Bots''' IsBodyHtml: False
 END
 Variables.IncreaseVariable Value: NewVar IncrementValue: 1
END
Excel.CloseExcel.CloseAndSave Instance: ExcelInstance
Outlook.Close Instance: OutlookInstance
FUNCTION Browser_Automation GLOBAL
 WebAutomation.LaunchChrome.LaunchChrome Url: $'''http://happybots.in/Employee-Onboarding-Process.html''' WindowState: WebAutomation.BrowserWindowState.Maximized ClearCache: False ClearCookies: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60 Timeout: 60 BrowserInstance=> Browser2
 # Start of autogenerated actions using the recorder
 @@source: 'Recorder'
 WebAutomation.LaunchChrome.AttachToChromeByUrl TabUrl: 'http://happybots.in/Employee-Onboarding-Process.html' AttachTimeout: 10 BrowserInstance=> Browser
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextFieldUsePhysicalKeyboard BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input text \'first_name\''] Text: CurrentItem[0] Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace UnfocusAfterPopulate: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextFieldUsePhysicalKeyboard BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input text \'first_name\' 2'] Text: CurrentItem[1] Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace UnfocusAfterPopulate: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextFieldUsePhysicalKeyboard BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input text \'DOB\''] Text: CurrentItem[2] Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace UnfocusAfterPopulate: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 IF CurrentItem[3] = $'''Male''' THEN
 WebAutomation.SelectRadioButton.SelectRadioButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input radio \'male\'']
 ELSE
 WebAutomation.SelectRadioButton.SelectRadioButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input radio \'female\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 END
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextFieldUsePhysicalKeyboard BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input text \'job_position\''] Text: CurrentItem[4] Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace UnfocusAfterPopulate: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 WebAutomation.SetDropDownListValue.SetDropDownListValueByName BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Select \'Select your Department\''] OptionNames: CurrentItem[5] UseRegularExpression: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextFieldUsePhysicalKeyboard BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input text \'Contact_Number\''] Text: CurrentItem[6] Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace UnfocusAfterPopulate: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextFieldUsePhysicalKeyboard BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input text \'Personal_EmailID\''] Text: CurrentItem[7] Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace UnfocusAfterPopulate: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 IF CurrentItem[8] = $'''Mac''' THEN
 WebAutomation.SelectRadioButton.SelectRadioButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input radio \'Mac\' '] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 ELSE
 WebAutomation.SelectRadioButton.SelectRadioButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input radio \'Windows\' '] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 END
 IF CurrentItem[9] = $'''Wire''' THEN
 WebAutomation.SelectRadioButton.SelectRadioButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input radio \'MouseWired\' '] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 ELSE
 WebAutomation.SelectRadioButton.SelectRadioButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input radio \'MouseWireless\' '] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 END
 IF CurrentItem[10] = $'''Wire''' THEN
 WebAutomation.SelectRadioButton.SelectRadioButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input radio \'KeyBoardWired\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 ELSE
 WebAutomation.SelectRadioButton.SelectRadioButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input radio \'KeyBoardWireless\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 END
 IF CurrentItem[11] = $'''Wire''' THEN
 WebAutomation.SelectRadioButton.SelectRadioButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input radio \'HeadPhonesWired\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 ELSE
 WebAutomation.SelectRadioButton.SelectRadioButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input radio \'HeadPhonesWireless\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
 END
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... ocess.html\'']['Input button \'SUBMIT\'']
 @@source: 'Recorder'
 WebAutomation.ExtractData.ExtractList BrowserInstance: Browser Control: $'''html > body > form > fieldset > div:eq(1) > div''' ExtractionParameters: { ^['Css Selector', 'Attribute', 'Regex'], ['div > input', 'Own Text', ''] } ExtractedData=> OutputData
 # End of autogenerated actions using the recorder
 WebAutomation.CloseWebBrowser BrowserInstance: Browser
END FUNCTION
"
